instruction: Make a 3 sentence summary of the movie Avatar
output: Avatar is a science-fiction adventure film released in 2009. It is set in the 22nd century and revolves around a paraplegic marine who embarks on a mission to the planet Pandora. On Pandora, the marine is genetically paired with an Avatar, a human-Na'vi hybrid, which allows him to explore the planet and ultimately battle for the rights of the Na'vi people against colonialist forces.
